#summary Golf Markup Language Reference: StatisticSet.

= Description =

The  StatisticSet element is a container element for individual [[Statistic]].

Statistics change over time. When computed, they can be limited to a period of time or a set of golf courses. The 

StatisticSet element collects information about the time period, golf course, conditions used and all statistics computer with these parameters.

By keeping StatisticSet over time, it is possible to follow the evolution of statistics over time.

= Attributes =

The element has the following attributes:

 # id - Unique identifer.
 # date-from - Start date for data collection in statistics computation.
 # date-to- End date for data collection in statistics computation.

= Elements = 

== Descriptive Elements ==

The element has the following descriptive elements:

 # restriction

== Element Details ==

=== Restriction ===

The Restriction element is further divised in the following elements:

 # course-ref - A reference to a golf course.

StatisticSet must restraint their data source set to the list of courses referenced in the Restriction/course-ref.


== Structural Elements ==

The element has the following structural elements:

 # [[Statistic]] - Individual statistic.
